DOC.brief_summary: Randomized pragmatic trial to evaluate the comparative effectiveness regarding disease specific quality of life of an individualized additional complementary medicine treatment in addition to usual care with usual care only in 280 women with breast cancer
DOC.brief_title: Life Quality and Mental State in Patients With Breast Cancer
DOC.criteria: diagnosed breast cancer current usual care treatment willing to refrain from complementary treatment for 6 months in case of randomization into the usual care group informed consent complementary treatment at the Hospital Meran in the last 6 months no German or Italian language ability participation in other study
